summary: 2024-2025 Water Year: Near-average precipitation overall, but wetter than average in Northern California (North of I-80). Warm valley/mountain temps leading to rapid snowmelt.
forecast: Strong ridge expected in Spring 2025, bringing heatwave and abrupt transition to dry conditions. Early spring season may be short; summer/fall season could be robust.

alerts.message: Rapid drying expected in late Spring 2025 due to heatwave.
Coastal fog drip may extend season in immediate coastal zones.
